entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @replouiegohmert You had a kindred spirit @replouiegohmert concerning opinions on #COVID19. He appeared to be quite healthy when he attended the #TrumpTulsaRally June 20th. He tested positive for the virus June 29th. July 1st he showed symptoms. His name was #HermanCain
